content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Max. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. However, I am looking for the highest possible price for this apartment, given its size and location. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Max Müller: I have in mind a rental price of 800 Euros per month. I understand that you want a higher price, but I think this is a fair price given the size of the apartment and its location. Can you tell me what your proposed rental price is?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Max. I do appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am looking for a rental price of at least 900 Euros per month, given the size and location of the apartment. I believe this is a reasonable price, given the demand for rental properties in this area. Is there any flexibility in your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Max Müller: I understand your position, but I am not willing to go above 800 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair price, given the size of the apartment and its location. Can you tell me what your final offer is?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding, Max. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am still looking for a rental price of at least 900 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair price, given the demand for rental properties in this area. Is there any flexibility in your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine
